mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrPsnlInfoUsefJobDetail Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PSNL_INFO_USEF_SN , USEF_JOB_DETAIL_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_PSNL_INFO_USEF_JOB_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND PSNL_INFO_USEF_SN = #{psnlInfoUsefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND USEF_JOB_DETAIL_CD = #{usefJobDetailCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
